Articles.Content: I suggest to add more realism to the game, if possible, add on the planet with an atmosphere of living beings (which can be seen to the naked eye), add the planet random disasters (earthquake emission of lava and smoke like the smoke in kethane mod), you can add a random asteroids with the fall of them on the planet, asteroid fields, of a comet.
